Contact Bayshore Home Sales for Expert Guidance and Trusted Manufactured Home Solutions
Get in touch with Bayshore Home Sales today for expert assistance. Discover testimonials, reviews, and how to reach our team or RHP Properties' corporate office for personalized manufactured home community solutions.

By clicking the button below, I consent to receive marketing messages, including text messages delivered by an autodialer, from RHP Properties or its affiliates to the number provided above. Consent is not a condition of purchase. You can opt out of marketing text messages by replying ‘STOP.’ Message and data rates may apply.

How can we help you? *
How can we help you? *
Enter:
Contact Us
Ready to connect? Our business is committed to exceptional customer service. Fill out our contact form today and let us help you find the perfect home. We’d Love to Hear From You!
Bayshore Home Sales
(888) 855-1818
Reviews
Connect With Us
Reviews
Still have questions?
Give us a call or browse our testimonials to hear from happy homeowners.
Stephanie and Laura are very polite and provide help when we need it as residents.
Flor S. - Creekside, TX
The minute I walked in the door I was treated just like family. I have felt right at home since I have moved in. Sue the property manager is the most helpful, courteous and kind person. Keep up the good work and I hope to have many years with my new family here.
Lance H. - Winter Paradise, FL
It's an awesome place to live. I have resided at Pecan Creek for 10 Year's. Phil is chill and knows how to get the ball rolling. The assistant Community manager, Stacey, is a nice compliment to the community as well.
Sabrina F. - Pecan Creek, TX
What a great spot! I'm so impressed with the management as well as the vibe of the place. Quiet, clean and well equipped and managed homes.
Rose C. - Country Club Estates, UT
I have been a resident of Thornton Estates for over ten years, and could not be happier. The park is kept clean, the staff is friendly and responsive, and have gone above and beyond to make sure the residents are taken care of. During the pandemic, they made sure to update us on the latest news, they found places to bring food in to those residents that were trying to navigate not going anywhere and trying to stay safe. They also helped those of us that were having trouble with rent, making sure we had access to organizations that would help. I've never lived somewhere where the resident's needs were first and foremost. The manager at Thornton Estates has become someone I could count on while I suffered through a major health crisis. Without her help and intervention, I don't know what I would have done. If you're considering moving in, don't hesitate. You won't regret it.
Laura H. - Thornton, CO
Very peaceful and clean . Local businesses nearby . Great place to live
Mireya H. - Redwood Estates, CO
Both me and my husband have lived here since November 2016!! New management has made us really feel on top of this world now!! So very proud to call the PONDAROSA TRAILER COURT our home now!!!!!
Nancy D.- Pondarosa, IN
Great place to live I have several family members that live there. The club house is amazing for private parties.
Bekki C.- Metro Commons, MI
I have lived here 4 years now and I'm very impressed with the improvements that are constantly being done doing already beautiful community. Kudos to John and his staff for keeping the neighborhood looking good and a big shout out to Cindy in the front office, who goes above and beyond for the residents of this community!! It's a pleasure to be here!!
Tracy Y.- New Oxford Commons, PA

Frequently Asked Questions
Have questions about Bayshore Home Sales? Our FAQs provide helpful insights about contacting our team, reading customer
testimonials, reaching RHP Properties' corporate office, and learning more about our trusted home solutions.
How can I contact Bayshore Home Sales?
You can reach out to Bayshore Home Sales by phone, email, or by filling out our convenient contact form. Our team is ready to assist with your homeownership needs.
Where can I find Bayshore Home Sales testimonials and reviews?
Our customer reviews and testimonials highlight the positive experiences of homeowners and their interactions with our business across our communities. Visit our testimonials section to hear what others say about Bayshore Home Solutions.
How do I reach RHP Properties' corporate office?
For inquiries related to RHP Properties, our parent company, you can contact their corporate office directly or get assistance through our support team.
What services does Bayshore Home Solutions provide?
Bayshore Home Solutions offers expert assistance with buying, selling, and financing manufactured homes in welcoming communities across the country.
Can I get personalized assistance when contacting Bayshore Home Sales?
Absolutely! Our friendly team is available to provide personalized guidance and answer any questions about available homes, financing options, and community features.

About Bayshore Home Sales
Building Communities. Fostering Healthy Living.
Bayshore Home Sales provides affordable homes in welcoming manufactured home communities, offering a strong sense of community and easy moving-in options.
Bayshore Home Sales offers affordable homes in well-maintained manufactured home communities across 28 states.
Focused on fostering a sense of community with caring, on-site management.
Easy process for moving in, including savings, rewards, and financing options.
We make owning your own home a reality.
Bayshore Home Sales, a division of RHP Properties, offers affordable homes in well-maintained manufactured home communities across 28 states. We are committed to creating communities where neighbors care for one another.
Each Bayshore community includes on-site management that ensures the property is maintained, issues are resolved quickly, and shared spaces are inviting and enjoyable. Our managers build personal relationships with residents, making everyone feel welcome and supported. At Bayshore, we prioritize exceeding expectations and redefining what it means to live in a manufactured home community.
It's Easy to Join a Bayshore Community!

Move Your Home to Our Community and Save up to $8,000
Refer a Resident and Receive up to $1,000
Enjoy Easy Financing from Our Preferred Lenders

RHP Social community events are designed to encourage our residents to socialize with their fellow community members through fun, family-friendly BBQs, holiday parties, and more! If you’ve found a community that suits your needs, contact our team today and let’s get started on the application process.

Encouraging Connection and Community Engagement with RHP Social Events
By bringing people throughout the community together, we wish to deepen the relationships and connections you feel with fellow residents, and also with our staff members. When we spend more time with our neighbors, we have the opportunity to understand each other better and it makes the community we all live in feel even more like home.

The best part of celebrating the holidays is bringing friends in Wheatland Estates, WI together for a festive dinner.
Residents in Western Hills, FL gather together to enjoy a community Thankful Dinner on Thanksgiving.
Celebrating the holidays is just as much fun for our Timberlake, FL staff as it is for our residents!
Dessau Fountain Estates, TX celebrates Easter in the best way possible: with an Easter egg hunt, of course!
Hartford Village, MD hosts a painting party as one of our community RHP social events!
Santa visits Crescent Village, UT to have dinner with our residents each year and ask the children what they want for Christmas.
In the Spring, kids in Millennium Estates, NV learn about planting flowers during their Kids Zone event.
Our Kenwood, TX community supports their residents and our troops at our annual Veterans Day Event.
Residents of Bunker Valley, NY ring in the new year with some of their closest friends and family in the community.
Find Your Next Home
In addition to our exciting social activities, there are a multitude of things to enjoy when you live in a Bayshore community. Our communities also support local businesses, providing residents with convenient access to a variety of services and shops. Additionally, our communities are committed to sustainability, encouraging residents to make the most of natural resources through various green initiatives. When you're ready to join the fun, head over to find a community near you with homes for rent or sale.
